valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Tue 3 Feb 2026 to 00:00 (UTC) on Wed 4 Feb 2026

Viking.text:
Wind
In southwest, southeasterly 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9 later. In northeast, southeasterly 4 to 6.
Sea state
In southwest, rough or very rough. in northeast, moderate or rough.
Weather
In southwest, snow showers. In northeast, mainly fair.
Visibility
In southwest, good, occasionally very poor. In northeast, good.

Gale warning
Issued:
